00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "JacobianCalculator.hpp"
00035 #include "MappingFunction.hpp"
00036 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00037 #include "TopologyInfo.hpp"
00038 
00039 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00040 
00041 void JacobianCalculator::get_Jacobian_2D( const MappingFunction2D* mf,
00042                                           NodeSet ho_bits,
00043                                           Sample location,
00044                                           const Vector3D* verts,
00045                                           size_t num_type_vert,
00046                                           MsqMatrix<3,2>& J_out,
00047                                           MsqError& err )
00048 {
00049   size_t num_vtx = 0;
00050   mf->derivatives( location, ho_bits, mIndices, mDerivs2D, num_vtx, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00051   mf->convert_connectivity_indices( num_type_vert, mIndices, num_vtx, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00052   const MsqVector<2>* d = mDerivs2D;
00053   const size_t* const e = mIndices + num_vtx;
00054   Vector3D c[2] = {Vector3D(0,0,0), Vector3D(0,0,0)};
00055   for (const size_t* i = mIndices; i != e; ++i, ++d) {
00056     c[0] += (*d)[0] * verts[*i];
00057     c[1] += (*d)[1] * verts[*i];
00058   }
00059   J_out.set_column( 0, MsqMatrix<3,1>(c[0].to_array()) );
00060   J_out.set_column( 1, MsqMatrix<3,1>(c[1].to_array()) );
00061 }
00062 
00063 void JacobianCalculator::get_Jacobian_3D( const MappingFunction3D* mf,
00064                                           NodeSet ho_bits,
00065                                           Sample location,
00066                                           const Vector3D* verts,
00067                                           size_t num_type_vert,
00068                                           MsqMatrix<3,3>& J_out,
00069                                           MsqError& err )
00070 {
00071   size_t num_vtx = 0;
00072   mf->derivatives( location, ho_bits, mIndices, mDerivs3D, num_vtx, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00073   mf->convert_connectivity_indices( num_type_vert, mIndices, num_vtx, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00074   const MsqVector<3>* d = mDerivs3D;
00075   const size_t* const e = mIndices + num_vtx;
00076   Vector3D c[3] = {Vector3D(0,0,0), Vector3D(0,0,0), Vector3D(0,0,0)};
00077   for (const size_t* i = mIndices; i != e; ++i, ++d) {
00078     c[0] += (*d)[0] * verts[*i];;
00079     c[1] += (*d)[1] * verts[*i];;
00080     c[2] += (*d)[2] * verts[*i];;
00081   }
00082   J_out.set_column( 0, MsqMatrix<3,1>(c[0].to_array()) );
00083   J_out.set_column( 1, MsqMatrix<3,1>(c[1].to_array()) );
00084   J_out.set_column( 2, MsqMatrix<3,1>(c[2].to_array()) );
00085 }
